name: Wordfall
description:
Wordfall for PC is best played with the keyboard, which makes it a great way to practice touch typing! It has its own leaderboards and a few unique shortcuts:

The '2' key toggles double speed (2x)

F1 and F2 switches themes. F3 opens the theme menu.

F11 toggles full screen.

Use the keys to enter words, enter to play them for points.

Please enjoy!

/ Lars

Email: lazdevgames@gmail.com
Twitter: Lazdev
